name: Brain Teaser - Math Riddle, Puzzle Questions
name_original: Brain Teaser - Math Riddle, Puzzle Questions
description:
Hello Guys,

This is my second Math puzzle game that I created.
If you are interested in Math riddle or puzzle games, this is for you for sure.
In the game, there are 99 levels (questions); in every update more levels will be added. So, stay tuned.
If you like to pass your free time by solving different type of question in each level, this is the best game for you.

Some questions are similar to International IQ Questions.So, if you are preparing for that kind of exam, some question might help you for your preparation.
These are some type of question in the game:
-Sequences
-Patterns 
-Logical Equations
-Logic Questions
-Shapes Matching
-Shapes and Arithmetic
-Shapes Base Number
-Alphabets Substitution  and a lot more others

There are Light and Dark theme in the game. 
The game is Black And White Minimalist Art Game and has really simple UI.
